welcome_message_body: "Welcome to St. James, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
